original_title: Cartoon Classics - Vol. 1: 25 Favorite Cartoons - 3 Hours
overview: Enjoy 3 more hours of Classic Cartoons from the Golden Age of Animation. Cartoon characters include Bugs Bunny, Porky Pig, Daffy Duck, Elmer Fudd, Betty Boop, Popeye, Little Lulu, Little Audrey, Casper the Friendly Ghost, Felix the Cat, Superman and many more. Featuring vintage Looney Tunes, Merry Melodies, Happy Harmonies and Max Fleischer cartoons with remastered sound.
title: Cartoon Classics - Vol. 1: 25 Favorite Cartoons - 3 Hours
